title: First win of the day bugged - unclaimed
body: Hello, in the morning i completed my FWOTD and it didn't credit any extra exp and instead said unclaimed in the missions tab. I tried restarting but now the mission doesn't show up at all. I gave it some time and it's still like that, is it just me?

replies.body:
I've been seeing some issues here and there with missions not updating correctly today, but this one definitely stands out. I'm not seeing any FWOTD mission being completed today, and I can't actually trigger it myself, unfortunately. 

Do me a favor and send any screenshots you might have of this mission messing up over to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Our game team will be able to look into this and make sure it's sorted out for you! Also, we'll be able to gather some data to help figure out what's going wrong and how it can be fixed.

I'm also experiencing the same issue. I finally won a game just now, knowing my FWOTD was up, but it gave me no exp... I checked and the mission was entirely gone. :( I wanted to be lvl 67 today dang it! lol
